Module com.tylerlieu.c195
Package com.tylerlieu.c195.controller

Class HomeController

java.lang.Object
com.tylerlieu.c195.controller.HomeController
All Implemented Interfaces:
javafx.fxml.Initializable
public class HomeController extends Object implements javafx.fxml.Initializable
This is the controller for managing the homeTab.fxml view.

  • Method Details

    • initialize

      public void initialize(URL url, ResourceBundle resourceBundle)
      This method is called as soon as the view begins to load. First, it calls the alert method upon logging in and changes label texts. Then, it sets up CellValueFactory for each column in the three tables. Then, it sets up cboxContact and sets the ObservableLists to the tables. Finally, it calls the three table loading methods.
      Specified by:
      initialize in interface javafx.fxml.Initializable
      Parameters:
      url -
      resourceBundle -

    • loadAppointmentTypesTable

      public static void loadAppointmentTypesTable()
      This method queries the appointments table and populates the TableView appointmentTypesTable.

    • loadContactScheduleTable

      public static void loadContactScheduleTable(Contact contact)
      This method queries the appointments table and populates the TableView contactScheduleTable.
      Parameters:
      contact - This Contact is user selected

    • loadCustomerDivisionsTable

      public static void loadCustomerDivisionsTable()
      This method queries the customers table and populates the TableView customerDivisionsTable.

    • alertUpcomingAppointment

      public void alertUpcomingAppointment()
      This method is called as soon as the user logs in. It calls AppointmentsQuery.findUpcomingAppointment() to find an upcoming appointment. It displays an appropriate alert depending on the outcome.

    • onContactSelect

      public void onContactSelect(javafx.event.ActionEvent actionEvent)
      This method is called anytime the user selects a different Contact from the combobox. It reassigns selectedContact with the newly selected Contact.
      Parameters:
      actionEvent -
